title: Unban
body:
So I've got banned a couple of months ago due "Third party program", from my conclusions it means that I've used scripts. And of course you guys told me that I shouldn't give out my personal details to someone else but I still did it, so the problem is now that I'm back from a transfer school and wanted to play some games with my friends again, but now since I'm banned and have spend a lot of money in this game I'm not able to play with them or play this game again...

Is there any way to give me an unban? Cause I can pay for it or won't the same thing in the future.
I hope you guys understand my situation and help me out soon.

Ohayooo EUW

replies.body: Typically once an account has been banned for the use of third-party programs it cannot be lifted for security reasons. You're always welcome to open that discussion, but it needs to be done in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with our account agents by selecting the option "I need help recovering my account".
